title: Fade Text
description: A scroll-based text fade component that gradually reveals text as the user scrolls

body.title: Body text
body.description: The text content that will fade in as the user scrolls. Each word will fade independently.

_fadeText.title: Fade Text Settings
_fadeText.description: Configuration options for the fade animation

_triggerPoint.title: Trigger Point
_triggerPoint.description: The viewport position (0-1) where text starts to fade in. 0.6 = 60% from top of viewport

_fadedColor.title: Faded Text Color
_fadedColor.description: The color of text before it fades in (e.g., #cccccc)

_activeColor.title: Active Text Color
_activeColor.description: The color of text after it fades in (e.g., #000000)

_transitionSpeed.title: Transition Speed
_transitionSpeed.description: CSS transition speed for the fade effect (e.g., 0.3s)

_smoothness.title: Transition Timing
_smoothness.description: CSS transition timing function (e.g., ease-out, linear, ease-in-out)

_disableAnimation.title: Disable Animation
_disableAnimation.description: Disable the fade animation (useful for accessibility)
